maqras.text: 49|14|Youmu renmen ceng shuo:“Women yi xindaole.” Ni shuo:“Nimen meiyou xindao. Suiran nimen keyi shuo:‘Women yi guishunle’, dan zhengxin hai meiyou ru nimen de xin. Ruguo nimen fucong an la he shizhe, ta bu jianshao nimen de shangong yi sihao. An la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.”
49|15|Xinshi, zhishi quexin an la he shizhe, ranhou meiyou huaiyi, neng yi ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er jinxing fendou de ren; zhe deng ren, que shi chengshi de.
49|16|Ni shuo:“Nandao nimen yi nimen de zongjiao tongzhi an la ma? An la shi zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie de, an la shi quanzhi wanwu de.”

49|17|Tamen yi ziji xinfeng yisilan, shi hui yu ni, ni shuo:“Nimen buyao yi nimen de xinfeng yisilan shi hui yu wo; buran an la yi yindao nimen yu zhengxin er shi hui yu nimen, ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
49|18|An la que shi zhidao tiandi de youxuan de, an la shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de.
50|1|Ga fu. Yi zunyan de “gulanjing” mengshi.
50|2|Nandao tamen yin tongzu de jinggao zhe lailin tamen er jingya ma? Bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Zhe shi qi shi!
50|3|Nandao women ji si zhihou, yi bian cheng chentu, hai yao huanyuan ma? Na tai bu jin qinglile.”
50|4|Wo que yi zhidao dadi duiyu tamen de boshi, wo zhe li youyi ben bei baohu de tian jing.
50|5|Tamen fouren yi jiang shi tamen de zhenli, suoyi tamen xianyu hunluan de zhuangtai zhong.
50|6|Nandao tamen meiyou yangshi tianti ma? Wo shi zenyang jianzao ta, dianzhui ta, shi ta meiyou quexian de?
50|7|Wo ceng zhankai dadi, bing jiang xuduo shanyue tou zai shangmian, hai shi ge zhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang chulai,
50|8|wei de shi qifa he jiaohui mei ge guiyi de puren.
50|9|Wo cong tianshang jiangxia jixiang de yushui, jiu jie ta er shengzhang chu xuduo guoshu he wugu,
50|10|bing shengzhang fushu di hai zao shu, ta you leilei de guoshi,
50|11|yong zuo zhong pu de jiyang. Wo jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Siren de fuhuo yeshi zheyang de.
50|12|Zai tamen zhiqian fouren shizhe de ren, you nu ha de zongzu, lan si de jumin, sai mo de ren,
50|13|a de ren, falao, lu te de tongbao,
50|14|conglin de jumin he tu bai de baixing, tongtong dou fourenguo shizhe, guwo suo jinggao de xingfa, shi biran jianglin de.
50|15|Wo ceng yin chuangzao er pijuan ma? Buran, tamen duiyu zaizao, shi zai yihuo zhong de.
50|16|Wo que yi chuangzao ren, wo zhidao ta xinzhong de wangxiang; wo bi ta de mingmai hai jin yu ta.
50|17|Dang zuo zai youbian he zuobian de liang ge jilu de tianshi jilu geren de yanxing de shihou,
50|18|ta mei shuo yiju hua, ta mianqian dou you tianshi dangchang jiancha.
50|19|Lin si de hunmi, jiang zhaoshi zhenli. Zhe shi ni yixiang suo taobi de
50|20|haojiao jiang chui xiang, na shi jinggao shixian zhi ri.
50|21|Mei ge ren dou yao daolai, quzhu de tianshi he jianzheng de tianshi, jiang yu ta tongxing.
50|22|Ni que shuhu ci shi, xianzai wo yi jie kai ni de mengbi, suoyi ni jinri de yanguang shi ruili de.
50|23|Ta de huoban jiang shuo:“Zhe zai wo mianqian shi xiancheng de.”
50|24|Ni lia suo yingdang touru huo yu de, shi mei ge gufu zhe, wangu zhe,
50|25|qianlin zhe, guofen zhe, huaiyi zhe,
50|26|yi bie de shenling yu an la tong shou chongbai zhe; ni lia jiang ta touru yanli de xingfa ba!
